enWisdom: Gratitude causes blessings to flow forth abundantly

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ عَلَى النِّعْمَةِ جَزَاءٌ لِمَاضِيهَا وَاجْتِلَابٌ لِآتِيهَا
enWisdom: Gratitude for blessings is a recompense for its past and a source of its [increase in the] future
Continue being grateful and the blessing upon you will continue

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ النَّاسِ حَالًا فِي النِّعَمِ مَنِ اسْتَدَامَ حَاضِرَهَا بِالشُّكْرِ وَارْتَجَعَ فَائِتَهَا بِالصَّبْرِ
enWisdom: The person who is in the best condition of all people is he who makes present blessings last by being grateful for them and gets those that are lost restored through patience

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِدَوَامِ الشُّكْرِ وَلُزُومِ الصَّبْرِ فَإِنَّهُمَا يَزِيدَانِ النِّعْمَةَ وَيُزِيلَانِ الْمِحْنَةَ
enWisdom: You must be constantly grateful and ever patient, for these two [qualities] increase blessing and remove tribulations
In gratitude for blessings lies their continuity

Wisdom: قَيِّدُوا قَوَادِمَ النِّعَمِ بِالشُّكْرِ فَمَا كُلُّ شَارِدٍ بِمَرْدُودٍ
enWisdom: Bind the approaching blessings with gratitude, for not everything that escapers comes back

Wisdom: لَنْ يَقْدِرَ أَحَدٌ أَنْ يَسْتَدِيمَ النِّعَمَ بِمِثْلِ شُكْرِهَا وَلَا يَزِينَهَا بِمِثْلِ بَذْلِهَا
enWisdom: Nothing has the ability to make blessings last like showing gratitude for them and nothing beautifies them like granting them [to others]
Whoever shows gratitude, his blessing lasts [longer]
